Text:
I should query the schema of the "postnl_account_delivery_facts_anonymized" table to see if it contains the information I need.
Action: sql_db_schema
Action Input: "postnl_account_delivery_facts_anonymized"

I can use the "postnl_account_delivery_facts_anonymized" table to get the top 50 parcels with their month_id. I will write a query to select the month_id and number_of_parcels columns from the table and limit the results to 50.
Action: sql_db_query
Action Input: "SELECT month_id, number_of_parcels FROM postnl_account_delivery_facts_anonymized LIMIT 50"

Answer: The top 50 parcels with their month_id are as listed above.
